BuildType.Name: Java Compile
BuildType.Description: Uses the Ant "javac" task to compile Java source code files. All dependencies added to this Build Task will be compiled using the compiler specified in the "compiler" Option parameter.

BuildTasks.Name: Set Classpath
BuildTasks.Description: Add dependencies to the Set Classpath Build Task that need to be included in the class path prior to compilation.

BuildTasks.Name: Ant Javac
BuildTasks.Description:
Uses the Ant "javac" task to compile Java source code files. All dependencies added to this Build Task will be compiled using the compiler specified in the "compiler" Option parameter.
If you want to place the compiled files in a subdirectory of the build location, use the "destdir" Option parameter.

Options.Description: If true, compile source with debug information.
Indicates the directory, relative to the build directory, where the class files should be stored. If it is not used, the class files will be stored in the build directory.
Valid parameters are: modern, classic, jikes, gcj, sj, javac1.2, javac1.3 and javac1.4
